participant_1.background:
I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax.
it s important for my instagram posts to look like i m having fun.
i want to learn how to fly an airplane.
I like to eat at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood.
i like watching ufc fights.

participant_2.background:
I love going on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
i have been married five times.
i escaped and later became a carpenter.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

content.text: Nice to meet you. What kind of things do you like to do?
I like to go on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
That sounds like a lot of fun. Do you ever go on any other types of adventures?
I once escaped from a burning building and later became a carpenter.
Wow, that sounds like a really intense experience. What made you want to become a carpenter?
I wanted to have a trade that would allow me to work on my own and be creative.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're very talented.
I'm not sure about that, but I do enjoy it.
Well, it sounds like you're a very interesting person.
Thank you. I like to think so.
I'm sure you'll find a great home with plenty of space for your sewing supplies.
Thanks, I hope so. I'm looking forward to moving in.
